usercssData.name: Discord Amoled Theme
usercssData.author: Logic_Mastermind
usercssData.description: [IMPORTANT]: Please frequently revisit this page and update the style every now and then.!! Working Theme !! Discord changed their css rules, this theme was updated to match with the update.Customize Discord's appearance to an easing dark amoled theme.This is still in development, so expect bugs etc.Feedback is greatly appreciated, so if you've found any issues, you can leave a review and I'll get back to it as soon as possible.Additional Images:Channel ColoursUser SettingsGuild Settings

usercssData.name: Dark Minimal WhatsApp Web
usercssData.author: Giorgio Adamo
usercssData.description: Sick of light? Join the darkness!Consider supporting me by donating on PaypalYou can easily change the accent/theme color and the font family according to your preference by clicking the button CUSTOMIZE right above the preview picture.Constantly updating as the newest WhatsApp web update release comes online. So if the skin breaks, it may take me maximum a couple of days to fix it, so don't worry and stay tuned. I will be on the case ;)Stay safe and have a productive day!UPDATED JANUARY 2022
